Description: Gridded Population of the World, Version 4 (GPWv4): UN-Adjusted Population Density
BLDFIE_M_sl3_250m_ll = Bulk density (fine earth) at 0.15m
CECSOL_M_sl3_250m_ll = Cation exchange capacity of soil at 0.15m
CLYPPT_M_sl3_250m_ll= Clay content (0–2 micro meter) at 0.15m
CRFVOL_M_sl3_250m_ll = Coarse fragments volumetric at 0.15m
BDRICM_M_250m_ll_b1 = Depth to Bedrock (up to 200cm)
BDRLOG_M_250m_ll = Predicted Probability of Occurence (0-100%) in the R Horizon
ORCDRC_M_sl3_250m_ll = Soil organic carbon content (fine earth fraction) at 0.15m
OCSTHA_M_sd2_250m_ll = Soil Organic Carbon Stock from 0.05m-0.15m
SNDPPT_M_sl3_250m_ll = Sand content (50–2000 micro meter) at 0.15m
SLTPPT_M_sl3_250m_ll = Silt content (2–50 micro meter) at 0.15m
PHIHOX_M_sl3_250m_ll = Soil pH x 10 in H2O at 0.15m
WC01 / BIO01 = Annual Mean Temperature
WC12 / BIO12 = Annual Precipitation
WC03 / BIO03 = Isothermality (BIO2/BIO7) (* 100)
WC05 / BIO05 = Max Temperature of Warmest Month
WC02 / BIO02 = Mean Diurnal Range (Mean of monthly (max temp - min temp))
WC11 / BIO11 = Mean Temperature of Coldest Quarter
WC09 / BIO09 = Mean Temperature of Driest Quarter
WC10 / BIO10 = Mean Temperature of Warmest Quarter
WC08 / BIO08 = Mean Temperature of Wettest Quarter
WC06 / BIO06 = Min Temperature of Coldest Month
WC15 / BIO15 = Precipitation Seasonality (Coefficient of Variation)
WC19 / BIO19 = Precipitation of Coldest Quarter
WC14 / BIO14 = Precipitation of Driest Month
WC17 / BIO17 = Precipitation of Driest Quarter
WC18 / BIO18 = Precipitation of Warmest Quarter
WC13 / BIO13 = Precipitation of Wettest Month
WC16 / BIO16 = Precipitation of Wettest Quarter
WC07 / BIO07 = Temperature Annual Range (BIO5-BIO6)
WC04 / BIO04 = Temperature Seasonality (standard deviation *100)
